title: When is preseason again?
body: when is preseason again and also link the end of season rewards please for me !! Thanks!

replies.body: The [**preseason update**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update) should hit sometime around Nov 8th. We've also got a nice little [**Ranked Rewards Help Desk**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk?sort_type=recent) boards post as well!
